projectGridLines.stationName: Ashoka Innovators for the Public, India
projectGridLines.title: Title: Building & Engaging Community of Social Entrepreneurs
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Building & Engaging Community of Social Entrepreneurs


Description: Working towards building and engaging the social entrepreneur and

young changemaker community - Ashoka Young Changemaker - is a global

network of powerful young people who are creating an Everyone A Changemaker

world. For more details, refer website - https://www.ashoka.org/en-in.

Skill sets:

- Leadership Role

- Entrepreneur mindset

- Interested in Social Work.

- Good in Community building.

- Effective Communication skills

Traits expectation:

Should be part of -

- Nirmaan

- NSS

- PARC

- Should have stood for elections in Studentsâ€™ Union(Any Post)


Expected learning:

Specific courses required for project execution:

- Fundamental of Finance and Accounting.

- Environmental development and climate change.

- Environmental Impact Assessment
